snippet: Delta reported a $712 million loss after taking $1.4 billion in special charges, mostly hedging losses.
abstract: Delta Air Lines reports fourth-quarter loss of $712 million, citing special charge of $1.4 billion that is largely related to fuel-hedging contracts; results nonetheless exceed analyst expectations.
lead_paragraph: Delta reported a $712 million loss after taking $1.4 billion in special charges, mostly hedging losses.

headline.main: A Quarterly Loss for Delta, but Still Better Than Expected
headline.print_headline: A Quarterly Loss for Delta, but Still Better Than Expected
